name: Biter Nymph
desc: A young Locust that specializes drawing blood and providing blood samples.

abilities.name: Drink
abilities.target: A creature you are grappling or riding.
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within Range. Clear all _Stun_ on a _Hit_+. If you _Wound_ them, gain a Blood Sample.

abilities.name: Envenom
abilities.prereqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack and the Target lost any _Stamina_.

stances.name: Find Sample
stances.desc: You find a target, attempting to latch onto them.
stances.effect: _Engage_ with the lowest _Stamina_ creature within Range that you do not have a Blood Sample from. In case of a tie, prioritize the closer. Then, use Latch. If you cannot, instead _Concentrate_.

stances.name: Take Sample
stances.desc: You drill deep on a grappled target, attempting to extract a sample of their essence.
stances.effect: Use Drink on a creature you are _Riding_ or _Grappling_. If you are not _Riding_ or _Grappling_ a creature, gain _Exposed_, attempt to _Engage_ a creature, then _Concentrate_.

stances.name: Return Sample
stances.desc: You dash away from an enemy, attempting to get a blood sample to an appropriate ally.
stances.effect: _Retreat_, then attempt to _Engage_ with a Chemist. If you do, give them all Blood Samples you have.

name: Needler Nymph
desc: A young Locust that specializes in firing pressurized spines.

abilities.name: Envenom
abilities.prereqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack dealt at least 1 Damage.
abilities.effect: Add _Poisoned_ 1 to the Attack. If you have an appropriate _Sample_, instead inflict _Poisoned_ 3.

stances.name: Needle
stances.desc: You take a shot at an enemy, attempting to strike them down from a distance.
stances.effect: If you are not _Engaged_, make an Attack with _Needle Shot_ against the most isolated enemy that is not in _Cover_, choosing between equivalent targets the case of a tie. You may then _Retreat_. If you are _Engaged_, instead gain +2 _Movement_ and _Retreat_.

stances.name: Snipe
stances.desc: You take careful aim, attempting to shoot down a foe from a distance.
stances.effect: At _Respite_, choose a Target, announcing it to the table. On your _Turn_, use _Needle Shot_ against the Target at _Advantage_, dealing +_1/2/3/4_ Damage. You may then _Retreat_. If you are _Engaged_, instead gain +2 _Movement_ and _Retreat_.

stances.name: Relocate
stances.desc: You take a shot at an enemy, attempting to strike them down from a distance.
stances.effect: _Retreat_, then attempt to move to the highest _Elevation_ possible. You may _Occupy_ _Cover_, if available.

name: Guardian Adult
desc: A Locust that specializes in defending the warren, blocking paths and restraining foes.

abilities.name: Armor Plating
abilities.effect: You do not have _Disadvantage_ to _Parry_ Ranged Attacks. This may be _Sundered_; if it is, lose 2 _Block_.

abilities.name: Envenom
abilities.prereqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack dealt at least 1 Damage.
abilities.effect: Add _Poisoned_ 1 to the Attack. If you have an appropriate _Sample_, instead inflict _Poisoned_ 3.

abilities.name: Perfect Parry
abilities.effect: The triggering Attack is _Glancing_. If you are in a _Defensive_ _Stance_ _Cost_ is instead None.

stances.name: Warden
stances.desc: You move to limit mobility through an arena, preparing to pounce.
stances.effect: On your _Turn_, you may _Recover_ or clear 4 _Stun_. The next time a creature enters your _Arena_ or stops being _Engaged_ with you you may immediately Move to _Engage_ them then strike them once with Grasping Claw as a _Reaction_.

stances.name: Guardian
stances.desc: You move to an ally, defending them against all incoming attacks.
stances.effect: On your _Turn_, Move to become _Engaged_ with an ally. While you are _Engaged_ with them all Attacks against them have _Disadvantage_, and you may use your _Defend_ Reactions for them; if you do, distribute the effect between you and the creature you are defending.

stances.name: Charge
stances.desc: You dart forward, attempting to engage and restrain a hostile creature.
stances.effect: On your _Turn_, Move to become _Engaged_ with the nearest enemy. You may _Brawl_ against them, choosing either <u>Slam</u> or <u>Overpower</u>. You may then become re-_Engaged_ if required, then use _Grasping Claw_.

stances.name: Avenger
stances.desc: You focus fire on an enemy that harmed one of your allies.
stances.effect: On your _Turn_, Move to become _Engaged_ with the nearest enemy that targeted the beneficiary of your Guardian Stance last turn or _Defeated_ one of your allies this or last _Round_. Make three Grasping Claw Attacks against them.

stances.name: Recover
stances.effect: On your _Turn_, _Recover_ or clear 4 _Stun_ three times, choosing an effect each time. You may then _Retreat_.
